Package model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
model.Card
public class Card extends Object
represents a card and contains the name of the card and the file name of the card image

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Card(String name, String fileName)
    creates a card with the given name and file name

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    destroyCard()
    Changes the card's 'destroyed' status (meaning it's been removed from the board) to true
    void
    flipCard()
    Changes the card's flipped flag (which indicates whether the card is flipped) to the opposite value
    String
    getFileName()
    gets the file name
    String
    getName()
    gets the card name
    boolean
    isDestroyed()
    Lets us know if if the card has been removed from the board
    boolean
    isFlipped()
    Lets us know if if the card is flipped face up or not

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String name, String fileName)
      creates a card with the given name and file name
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      fileName - the file name where the card image is located

  • Method Details

    • isFlipped

      public boolean isFlipped()
      Lets us know if if the card is flipped face up or not
      Returns:
      A boolean. "True" means card is flipped face up, "False" means it's face down

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Lets us know if if the card has been removed from the board
      Returns:
      A boolean. "True" means card has been removed from the board

    • destroyCard

      public void destroyCard()
      Changes the card's 'destroyed' status (meaning it's been removed from the board) to true

    • getName

      public String getName()
      gets the card name
      Returns:
      the the name of the card

    • getFileName

      public String getFileName()
      gets the file name
      Returns:
      the file name where the card image is located

    • flipCard

      public void flipCard()
      Changes the card's flipped flag (which indicates whether the card is flipped) to the opposite value
